// filepath: d:\01_VSCODE\clientcontactapp\src\utils\dateUtils.ts
export function formatDate(dateString){if(!dateString)return'';const date=new Date(dateString);if(isNaN(date.getTime()))return dateString;const day=date.getDate();const month=date.toLocaleString('default',{month:'long'});const year=date.getFullYear();const getOrdinal=n=>{if(n>3&&n<21)return'th';switch(n%10){case 1:return'st';case 2:return'nd';case 3:return'rd';default:return'th';}};return"".concat(day).concat(getOrdinal(day)," ").concat(month," ");}
